description: Suite of four nscd netgroup cache vulnerabilities: stack overflow, NULL deref, metadata corruption, and uninitialized memory use

expected_stock.description: Stack overflow from oversized netgroup response; NULL dereference on not-found; cache metadata corruption enabling cache poisoning; information disclosure via uninitialized memory

expected_tsm.description: Trailing canary detects overflows at free(); ReturnSafeDefault prevents NULL dereference; ClampSize limits oversized copies; quarantine scrub prevents stale data leakage
